EmailTemplate.subject: Acknowledgement Application Letter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Opportunity.CreatedDate}
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
Application for Enrolment {!Opportunity.Application_Received_Date__c}
Thank you for considering St Andrew's Cathedral School for {!Opportunity.Student_Name__c}'s important educational and personal development. We acknowledge receipt of the non-refundable Application Fee of $200.00.
The next step in the enrolment process is an interview with the Registrar. You will be contacted approximately one to two years prior to entry to make an appointment.
If you would like any further clarification in relation to your application, please do not hesitate to contact me on 9286 9579
Yours Sincerely
Gail Zietsch Enrolment Assistant
